price: Disa prej tyre e besuan atë[66] e disa iu shmangën atij. Për ata mjafton Xhehenemi përcëllues.
arabic: فَمِنۡهُم مَّنۡ ءَامَنَ بِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مَّن صَدَّ عَنۡهُۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِجَهَنَّمَ سَعِيرًا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: famin'hum man āmana bihi wamin'hum man ṣadda ʿanhu wakafā bijahannama saʿīran
